Question: Following his success in the Gulf War, this person indicated a desire to retire from the military in mid-1991.
Hints: In July 1978, this person became deputy director of plans at the U.S Pacific Command in Hawaii.
In 1946 when this person was 12, he moved with his father to Tehran, Iran.
This person remained at his command in Riyadh through December, making frequent frontline visits to the troops.
